Post.title: Hexo
Post._content:
# Hexo
> ~


## 
>Hexo[Github](https://github.com/hexojs)[](https://hexo.io/zh-cn/)

#### 
- NodeGit
- `npm install -g hexo-cli`hexo,hexo

---

#### 

- `hexo init <folder>`folderfolderfolderfolder
- `npm install`

---

#### 
>  __ _config.yml, __ themes_config.yml


1. ____

|  |  |
| ---- | :--: |
| title |  |
| subtitle |  |
| description | SEO |
| author | ~ |
| language | zh-CN |
| timezone |  |
| url | https://yokiyokiyoki.github.io/blog/ |
| root | /blog/cssjs |

2. ____

|  |  |
| ---- | :--: |
| theme | thememeteriallandscape |
| deploy | GitHub`type: git,repo: https://github.com/yokiyokiyoki/blog.git,branch: master` |

---

#### 
- `hexo new ..`
- `hexo g`,`hexo generate`
- `hexo d``github``hexo deploy`deploy_git
- `hexo s``hexo server`
- `hexo clean` (db.json)  (public)
- `hexo version``Hexo`
---

## 
>next[GitHub](https://github.com/iissnan/hexo-theme-next)[](http://theme-next.iissnan.com/)

-  Next
    - `theme``git clone`
    - 
    - `theme` __next__

---

## 
- hexomaster
- nexthtml
- `.deploy_git`
- hexohexo`hexo clean``hexo g``hexo d`,
- master

## 
> ``

- `hexo new draft "draftName"`source/_drafts_drafts
- `reder_drafts:true``hexo server --drafts`
- `hexo publish [layout] <title>`,`layout`

Post.title: nvm
Post._content:
# Node Version Managernode ## nvmnode > nodenvm
nvmnodenpm #### nvm [Github](https://github.com/coreybutler/nvm-windows) `C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\nvm`node > `nvm`, #### - nvm list #node - nvm install 4.2.2 # 4.2.2 - nvm use 4.2.2 # 4.2.2 - nvm uninstall 4.2.2 #4.2.2 #### > nvm`http://nodejs.org/dist/`, - nvmsetting.txt ```bash node_mirror: https://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/node/ npm_mirror: https://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/npm/ ```
Post.raw:
--- title: nvm date: 2017-03-10 11:04:09 tags: "node" comments: false --- # Node Version Managernode ## nvmnode > nodenvm
nvmnodenpm #### nvm [Github](https://github.com/coreybutler/nvm-windows) `C:\Users\Administrator\AppData\Roaming\nvm`node > `nvm`, #### - nvm list #node - nvm install 4.2.2 # 4.2.2 - nvm use 4.2.2 # 4.2.2 - nvm uninstall 4.2.2 #4.2.2 #### > nvm`http://nodejs.org/dist/`, - nvmsetting.txt ```bash node_mirror: https://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/node/ npm_mirror: https://npm.taobao.org/mirrors/npm/ ```

Promise

  • Promise.reject(new Error(42)) === new Promise((resolve,reject)=>reject(new Error(42)))
  • PromisePromise.all([promise1,promise2])thenpromise1promise2all
